caption.p: Surfactant-Assisted Self-Assembly and Formation of Solid and Hollow Superparticles
(A) Schematic description of iron oxide NP assemblies formed at two different temperatures.
(B) Transmission electron microscopic (TEM) images of solid superparticles.
(C) TEM images of hollow superparticles. Scale bars, 500 nm.
Reproduced with permission from Park et al. ( Park et al., 2016). Copyright 2016 John Wiley & Sons, Inc.
